compliant.section: 本隱私權保護政策(以下簡稱「本政策」)由揚明光學股份有限公司及其關係企業(以下簡稱「本公司」)為本公司客戶、產品服務之使用者、企業客戶及承包商之員工、職缺應徵者、網站之註冊會員、到訪本公司廠區的訪客或其他瀏覽本公司網站之瀏覽者(以下簡稱「您」)之隱私權制訂，幫助您瞭解本公司如何蒐集、使用及保護本公司所取得之您的個人資料，亦將說明本公司如何揭露、傳輸您的個人資料及收受對象。
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: 若您為未成年人，您應於您的父母親(或監護人)閱讀並瞭解本政策後方繼續瀏覽本公司網站。
compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services

compliant.section: 蒐集個人資料的目的及依據：
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data

compliant.section: 本公司為維護現有產品或服務品質、未來提供更好的產品或服務，或履行本公司的法定義務，本公司可能需要蒐集您提供的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing

compliant.section: 本公司具有合法利益，但該合法利益不超越您的利益、基本權利及自由為限。
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing is lawful if it is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party, except where such interests are overridden by the interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject which require protection of personal data, in particular where the data subject is a child.

compliant.section: 您同意提供的您的個人資料
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject is a lawful basis for processing

compliant.section: 本公司為履行法律義務之必要
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject.

compliant.section: 法律明文規定。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is lawful if there is a legal obligation.

compliant.section: 您自行公開或其他已合法公開之個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject has given consent to the processing of his or her personal data for one or more specific purposes; The processing of personal data relating to the data subject, by the data subject, or by a third party where the data subject has made the personal data public.

compliant.section: 本公司為協助公務機關執行法定職務或非公務機關履行法定義務必要範圍內(包括但不限於法定申報義務)。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject.

compliant.section: 經您書面同意。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject has given consent to the processing of his or her personal data for one or more specific purposes.

compliant.section: 本公司將盡力確保於跨境傳輸您的個人資料時符合本公司所在地及傳輸對象國家的法律規定，如果兩者規定不同的將以較嚴者為準。
compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations

compliant.section: 本公司已採取業界常用標準加密技術及組織規劃措施，致力於防止您提供的個人資料因本公司故意過失而非法毀損、遺失、篡改、未經授權揭露、未經授權存取以及其他非法、未經授權或超出本政策約定內容以外之處理。
compliant.legal provisions: Security of processing

compliant.section: 本公司同時盡力採取合理的儲存限制措施，只在合法且必要的期間內保留您提供的個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (specifically, storage limitation)

compliant.section: 在符合法律規定的前提下， 對於您的個人資料您可向本公司主張享有以下權利
compliant.legal provisions: Chapter III: Rights of the data subject

compliant.section: 查閱您已提供的個人資料、要求該資料副本、要求修改或更正資料或其他與您已提供的個人資料相關之權利
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject, Right to rectification

compliant.section: 在具備合法理由前提下，要求刪除或限制處理您的個人資料
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’), Right to restriction of processing

compliant.section: 要求在可能的範圍內，以可能的形式，移轉您的個人資料
compliant.legal provisions: Right to data portability

compliant.section: 撤回您同意本公司處理您個人資料的意思表示(請您留意，此不影響本公司收到您的撤回表示前處理該資訊的合法及正當性，也不影響本公司依照其他合法性基礎而處理您已提供的個人資料之合法性)
compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent

compliant.section: 向您所在地的資訊保護主管機關針對本公司處理您的個人資料進行申訴
compliant.legal provisions: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

compliant.section:
聯絡方式
如對本政策有任何疑問，或有其他與本政策有關之問題，歡迎聯絡我們與本公司人員取得連繫。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to information (Articles 12, 13 GDPR) - The policy provides contact information for users to ask questions about the policy, which aligns with the GDPR's requirement for transparency and providing a point of contact.

compliant.section:
✓ 允許
✗ 拒絕
通過允許這些第三方服務，您將接受他們的cookies以及使用正確運行所需的追踪技術.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent (Article 4(11) and 7 GDPR) - The policy mentions that by allowing third-party services, users consent to their cookies and tracking technologies. This aligns with the GDPR's requirement for freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous consent.

compliant.section: This website uses cookies.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and information to be provided when personal data are collected (Article 12) and (Article 13)

compliant.section: Privacy Policy
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject (Article 14) and (Article 13)

compliant.section: Cookie Policy
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (Consent) (Article 5(1)(a) and Conditions for consent (Article 7(4))

non_compliant.section: 若您使用本網站的服務(包括但不限於註冊會員、填寫聯繫表單)，或以其他任何方式將您的個人資料提供予我們，皆將被視為您或您的父母親(或監護人)同意本政策。
non_compliant.amend: It is unclear whether the user has been given a genuine choice or has a free will to refuse or withdraw consent.  It is also unclear what happens if consent is not given.

This is too vague and does not constitute a legitimate interest under the GDPR.  It needs to be more specific and demonstrate a clear and compelling reason for processing the data. For example, it could be amended to 'Fraud prevention and detection to ensure the secure operation of our business.'

non_compliant.section: 本公司與您開展商務合作之必要
non_compliant.amend: While this could be considered part of legitimate interest, it needs to be more specific about the necessity.  It should clearly explain how the data processing is necessary for the performance of a contract or to take steps at the request of the data subject before entering into a contract. For example, it could be amended to 'Processing your data is necessary for us to perform our contractual obligations to you, such as delivering goods or providing services.'

non_compliant.legal provisions: Requires a separate and explicit consent for marketing activities.
non_compliant.amend: Direct marketing requires explicit consent. The policy should clearly state that the data subject has the right to object to processing for marketing purposes and provide an easy way to opt-out.

non_compliant.section: 如您為本公司註冊會員，依您提供的個人資料行銷您可能偏好的活動、產品或服務
non_compliant.legal provisions: This needs to be more specific about the legal basis for processing data for marketing to members.  It should clearly state that processing is based on consent and that members have the right to withdraw consent at any time.
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to clearly state that processing for marketing purposes is based on consent and that members have the right to withdraw consent at any time. It should also specify how consent is obtained and how members can opt-out.

non_compliant.section: 資訊系統暨安全之管理
non_compliant.amend: While this could fall under legitimate interest, it needs to be more specific about the types of data processed and the security measures taken. For example, it could be amended to 'We process your data to ensure the security of our IT systems, including protection against unauthorized access, use, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.'

This needs to be more specific about the data processed and the purpose. For example, it could be amended to 'We process your data to manage our relationships with customers and suppliers, including processing orders, payments, and invoices.'

non_compliant.section: 法令遵循或服從公權力
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this section correctly identifies a legal basis, it needs to be more specific about the legal obligations the company is complying with.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide specific examples of the legal obligations it is complying with, such as tax laws or anti-money laundering regulations.
